testcase.name: Purchase order
testcase.system-out: Step 1: Logging in... Using login URL: https://erp.poundshop.com/login Username: Hitesh Login successful. Step 5: Navigating to Purchase Order module... Step 6: Clicking on Search by Purchase Order... Step 7: Entering search term: Poundland... Step 8: Pressing Enter to search... Step 9: Clicking refresh icon... Purchase Order search test completed.
